author: SGT SNUFFY
content: This grand lady and her husband are Black Americans that need to be shown and taught of their history and contributions to not only America but to the World to the young of our Schools. Black Americans that have made great strides in the Sciences, Agriculture, Engineering, Medicine and Literature are shoved into the dustbins of history while cretins such as Al Sharpton, Jesse Jackson, Tupac, Snoop Dog, Criminals, and Sports figures are held forth as heroes for young Black Americans. Oh and lets not forget the victim cards that are used nowadays also.
